A 72-year-old patient comes to the physician office with complaints of fatigue and low energy. Detailed  laboratory and imaging investigations were done. Serum M-protein shows <3 g/dL. Bone marrow shows plasma cells <10 percent. There are no lytic lesions, anemia, hypercalce - mia, and renal insufficiency. What is the diagnosis?
D: Monoclonal gammopathy of undetermined signifi - cance (MGUS)
